ComicInfo.Title: Under the Knife Pt. II; Episode: 1 "Beginnings"; Radioactivity Time; The Accident; Collateral Damage; Signed and Sealed; Three Angry Men; Out of Order
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sarah is game-master but the guys insist on killing townfolk instead of adventuring.
The Captain and Doc are held in a cell while their crew travels to their rescue.
Mother Earth sends an Earth Elemental to wreck vengeance on mankind but are stopped by the Heroes of HackLeague.
An adventuring party prepares to enter the Cave of Doom looking for the Scroll of Amil-Da.
Three of the four members of the party are mutated by cosmic rays.
Two of the group discuss their new role-playing characters.
Newt's new character joins the group in a dungeon expedition.
Newt borrows the money to train his character from the other group members, using his magic items as collateral.
Brian's character tries to argue the groups way out of murder charges but succeeds only in getting them imprisoned in the Borax Mines of Flindeleeze.
The group's characters are taken for sentencing for various crimes. The players believe that the Game Master is gunning for their characters.
